category: Safety and Health Management Regulations/Article 16 (Safety Management Committee)
contents: Article 16 (Safety Management Committee) ① The Chairman of the Board of Directors shall form and operate a Safety Management Committee in which workers, experts, etc. participate to deliberate and advise on safety-related matters in accordance with Article 11 of the Safety Management Guidelines. Revised December 16, 2022., ② The chairman of the Safety Management Committee shall be the Planning Director, and external experts related to disaster and safety may be appointed as members., ③ Details regarding the composition and operation of the Safety Management Committee shall be separately determined by the Chairman.
